title: Zed
body: for zed, is **blade of the ruined king** better than **ravenous hydra**?

replies.body: From what I've heard, Bork is a better dueling item, Hydra is good for a more burst oriented build, but may not be necessary.  Up to you.
Get Brutalizer into BoTRK, never buy hydra and don't waste gold on buying the daggers in the recipe.
how is buying the daggers a waste of gold? getting them is the same as saving the gold to get the full thing you just get some of the stats while you wait.

You dont really need hydra, since zed isnt really a tank. Bork gives zed good speed and element of surprise. I would say Bork is better than Hydra for zed{{champion:238}}={{item:3153}}     not really{{item:3074}}
